title: Participle Clauses 1
description: Make a reduced relative clause. These sentences all need an active clause.

parts.value: We broke the computer (the computer belongs to my father)

parts.answer: We broke the computer belonging to my father.
answerList: We broke the computer belonging to my father.

parts.value: The man is in the garden (the man is wearing a blue jumper)

parts.answer: The man wearing a blue jumper is in the garden.
answerList: The man wearing a blue jumper is in the garden.

parts.value: We found a doctor (the doctor works at a hospital in Madrid)

parts.answer: We found a doctor working at a hospital in Madrid.
answerList: We found a doctor working at a hospital in Madrid.

parts.value: People will not be allowed to enter (people have arrived late)

parts.answer: People arriving late will not be allowed to enter.
answerList: People arriving late will not be allowed to enter.

parts.value: Don't wake the baby (the baby is sleeping in the next room)

parts.answer: Don't wake the baby sleeping in the next room.
answerList: Don't wake the baby sleeping in the next room.

parts.value: Who is that boy (that boy is walking in the forest)?

parts.answer: Who is that boy walking in the forest?
answerList: Who is that boy walking in the forest?

parts.value: The man is over there (the man wants coffee)

parts.answer: The man wanting coffee is over there.
answerList: The man wanting coffee is over there.

parts.value: Those books were mine (those books had been lying on the table)

parts.answer: Those books lying on the table were mine.
answerList: Those books lying on the table were mine.

parts.value: Julia is on the train (the train is arriving at Platform 3)

parts.answer: Julia is on the train arriving at Platform 3.
answerList: Julia is on the train arriving at Platform 3.

parts.value: They called a lawyer (the lawyer lived nearby)

parts.answer: They called a lawyer living nearby.
answerList: They called a lawyer living nearby.
